sentences.en: And there's another's maw pepper soup.
sentences.cn: 还有同场加映──加料版胡椒猪肚汤!

sentences.en: Customer can get 1 year membership, with purchase any Mandarin Fish Maw item above HK $ 1000.
sentences.cn: 顾客惠顾任何文华产品满HK$1000,便可获得会籍一年.

sentences.en: Does maw have empty fire how to treat?
sentences.cn: 人的胃有虚火怎样治疗?

sentences.en: Ebonweave now requires the tailor to be in Maw of Neltharion in Dragonblight to create it.
sentences.cn: 黑纹布现在需要裁缝在耐萨里奥之喉(龙骨荒野)地区制造.

sentences.en: Entire stars can be stripped and pulled into the bottomless maw.
sentences.cn: 这个无底洞甚至将整个星球分解后吸入.

sentences.en: He felt the maw heavy and slippery in his hands and he slit it open.
sentences.cn: 他觉得鱼胃在手里重甸甸、滑溜溜的,就把它剖开来.

sentences.en: I saw the opening maw of hell ( Herman Melville )
sentences.cn: 我看到地狱张开了无底洞 ( 赫尔曼梅尔维尔 )

sentences.en: I'm gonna cook me up some chitterlings maw.
sentences.cn: 我要自己煮个猪肠跟猪肚来吃.

sentences.en: Sashimi made from the maw of bluefin tuna cost 300 NT per slice.
sentences.cn: 黑鲔肚子的生鱼片以片计价,一片三百元.

sentences.en: Sea cucumber, maw, squid must be made transparent to the soft.
sentences.cn: 海参 、 鱼肚 、 鱿鱼均必须发透至软.

sentences.en: Some fear that the cost of servicing the debts to the EU and IMF, and of feeding the insatiable maw of the banks, will eventually force Ireland into a debt restructuring.
sentences.cn: 有人担心为了偿还欧盟和IMF贷款所需的高额服务费，在加上难以满足永远也喂不饱的银行的胃口，爱尔兰最终会被逼得要进行债务重组。

sentences.en: The explanation for all this is undoubtedly the open maw and changing dietary habits of the world’s fast-expanding population.
sentences.cn: 世界肥料行业之所以这么活跃，无疑是因为世界快速增长的人口大开胃口和饮食习惯的改变。

sentences.en: The war swallowed up many young men into its maw.
sentences.cn: 战争把许多青年男子吞进了它的无底洞.

words.tran_cn: （动物的）胃；嗉囊（鸟的）；（动物的）咽喉
